title: WEN by Chaz Dean Lavender Re Moist Hydrating Hair Mask 4 oz
WEN® Lavender Styling Creme 6oz
description: Achieve all your styling options and the benefits of a leave-in conditioner, polishing gloss and gel in one product. This amazing styling creme works great on straight, wavy and curly hair types to give them rich moisture, gleaming shine and body with hold. The virtually weightless formula is used as a heat-protectant from damage caused by styling tools, and also to tame frizz when drying naturally.

title: Moroccanoil by Moroccanoil Moroccanoil Luminous Hairspray Aero for Unisex, 10 Ounce
description: * Won't leave hair looking brittle or dried out * Maintains shape and style while adding a burst of shine! * Leaves hair manageable, no sticky residue * Holds your do all day long
